item.title: Biden commutes 1,500 jail sentences, grants pardons for 39 others: 'Largest single-day grant of clemency'

item.title: Alaska outraged at federal oil lease sale setup being 'fitting finale' for fossil fuel-averse presidency
item.description: Major Alaskan officials are up in arms at how the Biden administration went about its final required lease auction for land in the ANWR-1002 refuge.
